actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department; OMB.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Alcoholism and Drug Abuse.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Alcoholism and Drug Abuse

official_title: A bill to specifically include Native Hawaiians within a group of underserved populations for purposes of the Comprehensive Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism Prevention, Treatment and Rehabilitation Act of 1970.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism Prevention, Treatment, and Rehabilitation Act of 1970 to include Native Hawaiians within the category of "underserved populations" for purposes of treatment and prevention services.

titles.title: A bill to specifically include Native Hawaiians within a group of underserved populations for purposes of the Comprehensive Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism Prevention, Treatment and Rehabilitation Act of 1970.
